comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 7.0; Windows NT 5.1; InfoPath.2; .NET CLR 1.1.4322; .NET CLR 2.0.50727; .NET CLR 3.0.04506.30; .NET CLR 3.0.04506.648; .NET CLR 3.5.21022; .NET CLR 3.0.4506.2152; .NET CLR 3.5.30729)
Build Identifier: 

Selection of field from section "selected columns" doesn't disapear when you add some ather field to "selected columns" section

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
Steps to reproduce:
1) log in Bugzilla
2) Do any search that returns several bugs
3) Click on "Change columns" link from result set.
4) Select some filed ( in example "Target") from "Available columns" section and click on "->" button
5) Several times click on "^" up button from "selected columns" section
6) Select some other field (in example "Keyword") from "Available columns" section and click on "->" button
7) Click on "^" up button from "selected columns" section

Actual Results:  
Fields that you select in step 4 and in step 6 will be moved up 

Expected Results:  
Only Keyword filed ( filed that you selected from step 6) will be moved up
comments.creator: stasyasin@gmail.com
comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 7.0; Windows NT 5.1; InfoPath.2; .NET CLR 1.1.4322; .NET CLR 2.0.50727; .NET CLR 3.0.04506.30; .NET CLR 3.0.04506.648; .NET CLR 3.5.21022; .NET CLR 3.0.4506.2152; .NET CLR 3.5.30729)
Build Identifier: 

Selection of field from section "selected columns" doesn't disapear when you add some ather field to "selected columns" section

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
Steps to reproduce:
1) log in Bugzilla
2) Do any search that returns several bugs
3) Click on "Change columns" link from result set.
4) Select some filed ( in example "Target") from "Available columns" section and click on "->" button
5) Several times click on "^" up button from "selected columns" section
6) Select some other field (in example "Keyword") from "Available columns" section and click on "->" button
7) Click on "^" up button from "selected columns" section

Actual Results:  
Fields that you select in step 4 and in step 6 will be moved up 

Expected Results:  
Only Keyword filed ( filed that you selected from step 6) will be moved up
comments.author: stasyasin@gmail.com

comments.raw_text:
Reproduced, but I'm not sure this is a bug.
Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64; rv:5.0a2) Gecko/20110513 Firefox/5.0a2


The Product of this alleged bug should probably be changed to Bugzilla or bugzilla.mozilla.org depending on if this is considered to be a program or site specific issue.
comments.creator: mozilla@ahlblom.eu
